mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board ( title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.iboard, a.title, a.iuser, a.regdt, b.unm AS writerNm, b.profileimg , case when c.iboard IS null then 0 ELSE 1 END AS isfav FROM t_board a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.iuser=b.iuser
LEFT JOIN t_board_fav c
INNER JOIN t_board_fav c
ON a.iboard = c.iboard AND c.iuser=#{iuser} ORDER BY a.iboard DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE iboard=#{iboard} AND iuser = #{iuser}
